metadata.title: CVE-2008-5146 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: add-accession-numbers in ctn 3.0.6 allows local users to overwritearbitrary files via a symlink attack on the /tmp/accession temporary file.

criterions.comment: ctn: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
